channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Wow That's Amazing
channel.desc: Get ready for incredible experiments and mind-bending puzzles to impress your friends with Wow That?s Amazing. Owain and Tilly are here to explore epic science tricks to try at home and showcase brand new technology innovations from around the world! In this episode, discover how to shrink your friends with trick photography, meet the smallest robots and the largest machine on Earth, feel the pressure with a bed of nails and explore the weird world inside a mirror.
